title: GADVASU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Guru Angad Dev Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (GADVASU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, M.Sc, and M.V.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the GADVASU Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend...
